title: Welcome to Workshops!
hint:
This space is for people that are eager to learn new things from colleagues and / or would like to organize a workshop themselves. All workshops are listed below and can be clicked to see further details and participate.

If you'd like to organize a workshop yourself, just press the button with the plus sign on it in the bottom right. After a successful creation, you'll get redirected to the details page of that new workshop. Feel free to copy and share that URL with colleagues.
